hudmanager.configuration.title: HUD Manager Configuration
hudmanager.configuration.ActionBar.toolt: Locates just above the hotbar, displays various texts
hudmanager.configuration.AutoSaveIndicat: Locates in the bottom right of screen, displays autosaving
hudmanager.configuration.BossBar.tooltip: Locates at the top of screen, displays health of boss mobs
hudmanager.configuration.ClosedCaption.t: Locates in the bottom right of screen, displays sounds in game
hudmanager.configuration.Crosshair.toolt: Locates in the middle of screen, displays the aim point
hudmanager.configuration.DebugScreen.too: Displayed when F3 is pressed, displays various information
hudmanager.configuration.PlayerList.tool: Displayed while holding down Tab, displays player information
hudmanager.configuration.ScoreboardSideb: Locates on the right of screen, displays objective information
hudmanager.configuration.ScreenTitle.too: Locates in the middle of screen, displays various texts
hudmanager.configuration.StatusEffect.to: Locates in the top right of screen, displays status effects
